topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c368906368722029750000#post_53c368906368722029750000
You know a thought occurs. Sentient aliens would have to be the result of evolution yes? If so then where the fuck do they get off acting so high and mighty? Life thrives on strife. A lack of conflict breads stagnation and anything that fit perfectly into its ecological niche would never have evolved past its most primitive stage because there is nothing acting to cause more beneficial mutations to be favored.

Look at crocs and sharks. They are more or less unchanged from ancient times because they are perfectly built for what they do.

Any species capable of developing interstellar travel would likely be at least as bad as us, if only in their more primitive past are really not in a position to pass judgement.
topics.author: 4f41ee04945b701c41002af7
